pages.text: A $(9)Gem$() is a crystal of condensed strength.$(p)When socketed into an affix item, a Gem will provide a powerful attribute bonus whenever the item normally would.

pages.title: Obtaining Gems
pages.text: Gems can be found in chest loot, and may rarely be found when killing mobs. However, for a gem to drop, the killer must be a real player, not a machine or other automation source.$(p)Gems are more likely to drop from Bosses.

pages.title: Socketing Gems
pages.text: To socket a gem into an item, combine the two in a Smithing Table.$(p)Place the item on the left, and the gem on the right.$(p)Gems do not need to be placed into a necessarily "correct" item, and will always provide their bonuses while the item is in use.

pages.title: Removing Gems
pages.text: Removing gems from an item was a difficult process, but some clever alchemists figured out how to do it.$(p)Their notes are detailed on the next couple pages.

pages.title: Searing Expulsion
pages.text: Combine a socketed item with a $(9)Vial of Searing Expulsion$() in a smithing table to remove the gems, destroying them in the process.

pages.title: Arcane Extraction
pages.text: Combine a socketed item with a $(9)Vial of Arcane Extraction$() in a smithing table to retrieve the gems, destroying the item in the process.
